features.Resolution: 1200x2670 pixels, LTPO OLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 3000 nits (peak)
features.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 3x3.2 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x3.0 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x2.3 GHz Cortex-A520)
features.Primary Camera 1: 50 MP, f/1.6, 23mm (wide), 1/1.31", 1.2µm, dual pixel PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
features.Primary Telephoto Camera: 50 MP, f/2.0, 75mm (telephoto), PDAF (10cm - ∞), OIS, 3.2x optical zoom
features.Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive
features.GPS: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (G1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)
features.Charging:
90W wired, PD3.0, QC4, 100% in 31 min (advertised)
50W wireless, 100% in 46 min (advertised)
